personal.name: Pav MunyPhalla
personal.title: Full Stack Developer & Software Engineer
personal.description: I build modern web applications with cutting-edge technologies. Passionate about creating user-friendly, scalable solutions that make a difference.

about.paragraph1: I'm a passionate software developer with X years of experience building web applications. I specialize in modern JavaScript frameworks, cloud technologies, and creating seamless user experiences.
about.paragraph2: When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open source projects, or sharing knowledge with the developer community.

projects.title: AgTeach E-Learning Platform
projects.description: E-learning marketplace enabling instructors to create and sell video courses
projects.keyFeature: User authentication, course management, video streaming, payment processing, admin dashboard
projects.outCome: Successfully deployed on AWS with CI/CD pipeline, implemented secure JWT authentication

projects.title: AgTeach E-Learning Instructor Platform
projects.description: A platform for instructors to create and manage market, online courses, including video uploads and course sales.
projects.keyFeature: User authentication, course management, admin dashboard
projects.outCome: Successfully deployed on AWS with CI/CD pipeline, implemented secure JWT authentication

projects.title: MovieDB Entertainment Platform
projects.description: A comprehensive movie discovery platform featuring advanced search functionality, detailed movie information, and integrated trailer playback.
projects.keyFeature: Seamless integration with The Movie Database (TMDB) API for real-time data
projects.outCome: Successfully delivered a dynamic movie discovery experience with real-time data fetching and responsive design

experience.title: Anchor Learning Management System
